How to export to png from odg

0. Open the file in LibreOffice Draw
1. Save a master copy or a back-up copy.
2. Select the entire area of the graphic or Select-All if desired.
3. Hover mouse over a section that has graphic and no text, then Right-Click.
4. Select "Convert", then "To Bitmap". You will notice that the graphics changes, don't worry.
5. Repeat Step 1.
6. Repeat Step 2.
7. Select "Save Graphic..."
8. Enter in file name, you don't have to enter the extension
9. Note the default path auto-populated, change if desired.
A. Change file format.
B. Save!
